summary: When the family dog gets sick, the kids and their friends rally to earn the money to pay for the veterinarian.
cast: Sherman Hemsley|Phil Vassar|Tina Witherby|Bridgette Potts|Jules Mayes|John Lowell|Gary Donald|Rhonda Leigh|Willa Fitzgerald|Lake Summar|Maggie Edwards|Peter Stringer-Hye|Jessica Claire Crosby|Marcy Williams Michael|Dakotah Evans
title: Uno más de la familia
